name: Wolf & Goats by BubbaJoe
description:
Wolf and Goats strategy board game. Wolf and Goats is also known by the name Cat and Dogs. Play against the computer or with a friend on the same device.

How To Play
----------------
The Wolf attempts to reach the other side of the board. The Goats can prevent this by trapping the Wolf without losing a single Goat.

The Wolf always moves first and can move both forwards and backwards along the diagonals. The Wolf can also jump over and eat Goats.

The Goats may only move forward along the diagonal and may not jump.

The game is over when the Wolf makes it past the goats, the Wolf eats a Goat, or if the Goats trap the Wolf.

In single player mode, the difficulty level will automatically increase or decrease as you win or lose. You can also manually adjust the difficulty level and then lock it into place to prevent it from automatically adjusting.
